pr_title: Bugfix: remaining smaller bugs after re-evaluate hotfix

timeline.message:
fix UI bugs

some problems still exist, e.g. reset answer option does not work correctly and resetting a questions leads to a dark background in the ace editor

timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: what happens if someone uses capital letters? can we do a lower case based comparison here an in all other cases?
replies.author: krusche

replies.bodyText:
That's a good question in general and not just in this case. I tested it now on a small example and it is not parsed correctly and the [Correct] tag (I tested it like that) is displayed.
I think a case insensitive parsing (for all commands) would be a nice addition at a later stage but it is not really urgent at the moment since there are buttons that add the tags correctly.
And I think that more people use the commands than typing them
replies.author: filip-gregurevic
